name: Space Dungeon (LDJAM40)
description:
It’s like dungeon, but only in space, you know. You will be able to stand against the most dangerous creatures from outer space.

Like :

  • Space Spider
  • Space Troll
    and you will never guess
  • Evil Space Boxes

Please, enjoy this ridiculously short game and call your friends.

LudumDare page : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/dungeon-space

(ratings and feedbacks are very welcome)
